participant_1.background:
My most valued possession is my health, because without it I cannot do the things that make me happy.
My children are my whole world, and I would love to find someone to share my love of Christmas with.
i m allergic to milk.
I do not wish to discuss my parents' death.
i have never traveled outside of the united states.

participant_2.background:
I want to live in a safe neighborhood with good schools, so my daughter and grandchildren can grow up happy and healthy.
My family is my everything.
i love sports , but rugby is my favorite.
i am allergic to seafood.
I am retired and enjoy spending time with my family and friends.

content.text: Hello! I hope your day is going well.
Hello there! It's going great so far, how about yours?
It is going well so far. Thanks for asking!
What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love spending time with my family and friends. I also enjoy watching movies and reading books.
That sounds fun! I like doing similar things. I also love watching movies and reading books.
What are some of your favorite movies and books?
Some of my favorite movies are the Lord of the Rings trilogy, the Harry Potter series, and the Hunger Games series.
Those are all great movies! I love the Lord of the Rings trilogy and the Harry Potter series.
Me too! What are some of your favorite books?
Some of my favorite books are the Lord of the Rings trilogy, the Harry Potter series, and the Hunger Games series.
We have very similar taste in books! Those are all great books.
I agree! They are all very well-written and have great characters.
I also love that they are all fantasy books.
Me too! I love the fantasy genre.
It's so much fun to escape reality and enter a world of magic and adventure.
I agree! It's a great way to relax and have fun.
